dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: ...Running this restaurant, I had forgotten something important...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: That's right, the chicken I wanted to cook...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: ...was something even my mother could enjoy.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Something to please her extremely particular palate...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: No...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: I knew all along.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: The real reason my mother wouldn't eat chickens...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: ...is because we couldn't afford to feed the whole family...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: It's why...we always had a stash of coupons at our home... Ten of them could be exchanged for a free chicken...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: My mother would keep collecting them for me...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: To feed me a chicken she wouldn't eat...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Hm?

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Oh.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: These are pizza coupons.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: You see, son...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: I liked pizza better...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: Agh... My head...
<He's back to normal.>
That was a sound plan. The carrot and stick approach. It's an effective tactic often employed in military operations.
That...was a plan? I don't see how that's any different from your usual bawling out and striking first...
It was executed subtly, and this roo- I mean, boy was able to catch the hint. You did well following along.
T-thank you, Captain Outis!
<You almost called him a "rookie", didn't you?>

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: I can't thank you enough. I think I'm ready to start anew.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: It wasn't the recipe I needed... As long as I remember to cook for those I care about... Even if it comes in the shape...of a pizza... My customers will still appreciate the heartfelt servings.
Oi, your rival promised us a lifetime voucher for free chickens. What do you have to give?
I thought I'd be stuffing my face with drumsticks of different flavors by now...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: It's nothing much, but please take this from me...
The owner of Eunbong's gave us a packaged box.

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: It's an invaluable treasure, there's nothing else like it...
Could we accept such a rarity?

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: I wouldn't have been able to reopen my restaurant without your help... So please take it as my thanks.
... And thus we have resolved the Distortion and earned ourselves this treasure!
Well, what say you? Are you perhaps speechless with astonishment at the glory of our tale?
I tuned out of your story since the part where you said "We embarked to Eunbong's".
That means you have not heard the story at all!
Why should I bother listening to your drivel when Faust's report will fill me in on all the details I need?
C'mon, Quixie. Forget about him and gather round so we can open up the box. Heeheehee.
I wonder what's inside~
Surrounded by Sinners full of anticipation, the lid of the box was removed...

dataList.title: Eunbong’s Bar & Fryers
dataList.content: 'This is Bongy, the one and only plushie of our mascot. I made it hoping it'll see use one day, and I'm glad to be giving it as a gift of gratitude. ^0^/'
It's... No, this can't be it. Maybe he hid something in the plushie's belly?
<He didn't look like the kind of person to prepare that sort of surprise...>
He was probably trying to get rid of it and we were there to take it.
Let's toss this thing in that con incinerator.
A hand gently tugged at the doll Heathcliff was gripping with ferocious rage.
Charon likes this passenger.
What's there to like about-
It's got eyes and nothing else.
I like that.
...Okay. That's that, then. Keep the doll.
That is an incorrect assessment as the doll has a torso and limbs.
Like that, the chicken plushie we got instead of free chickens for life earned its spot on the bus...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: Yes, Chief Dongrang. The Distortion has been resolved. I confirmed it with my own eyes.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: They did seem somewhat unreliable at first, yes... But I believe it should be okay to talk with them. Yes, I'll bring them over now.

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: W...What now?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: I...dislike sentences that lack a subject.

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: Once that restaurant reopens, I'll lose customers... Then I won't be able to fill the quota, and...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: You should've started looking for a way to live the moment you put the stolen recipe in a concept incinerator.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: Haven't you ever heard of the saying that goes, "If you're going to rob a house, make sure that the homeowner never realizes it"?

dataList.title: Bodhisattva Chicken
dataList.content: I... I don't know anything about... I didn't...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: Of course you won't, I just made that up. Remember it well next time.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: I'll be seeing you around, then.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept of Food Resource Development?
dataList.content: I have visitors to greet.
And before long, we got dragged into a mess of unprecedented scale...
